title: Decrement Function
description: DT_TO_SDT converts a date value into a structured date day of type SDT.
name: DEC1

input.name: X
input.description: An integer input value that will be decremented.

input.name: N
input.description: An integer input value used for calculation when X is zero.

return_value.description: The decremented integer value based on the conditions provided. Returns N - 1 if X is 0, otherwise returns X - 1.
